title: Missing Marie
description: In this Dateline classic, when Marie Singleton suddenly vanished, authorities wondered if she was a runaway, a victim of crime, or something else? Her secret job in the CIA would be revealed. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on December 6, 2013.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
